resources.string: Leave the grunt work to me
Are you sure you want to remove %1$s?
Are you sure you want to remove %1$s?\nThis Action is not reversible and deletes all occurrences of this exercise in logged session
Are you sure you want to remove %1$s?\nThis Action is not reversible and deletes all of their logged sessions

Are you sure you want to remove the session belonging to %1$s?\nThis Action is not reversible and deletes all session information included\n(If the client has a set schedule this session will be added to the makeup sessions list)

Select e.exercise_id, e.exercise_name, e.exercise_type, e.primary_mover_id, ( Case When e.exercise_type = 1 then m.muscle_name When e.exercise_type = 2 or e.exercise_type = 3 then j.joint_name End ) as \'primary_mover_name\', ifnull ( ( Select group_concat(s.secondary_mover_id) From secondary_movers s Where s.exercise_id = %1$d Group By s.exercise_id ), \'0\' ) as \'secondary_movers_ids\', ifnull ( ( Select group_concat ( ( Case When e.exercise_type = 1 then m.muscle_name When e.exercise_type = 2 or e.exercise_type = 3 then j.joint_name End ) ) From secondary_movers s left join Muscles m on s.secondary_mover_id=m.muscle_id left join Joints j on s.secondary_mover_id=j.joint_id Where s.exercise_id = %1$d Group By s.exercise_id ), \'0\' ) as \'secondary_movers_names\' From Exercises e left join Muscles m on e.primary_mover_id=m.muscle_id left join Joints j on e.primary_mover_id=j.joint_id Where e.exercise_id = %1$s;

Select e.exercise_id, e.exercise_name, e.exercise_type, e.primary_mover_id, ( Case When e.exercise_type = 1 then m.muscle_name When e.exercise_type = 2 or e.exercise_type = 3 then j.joint_name End ) as \'primary_mover_name\', ifnull ( ( Select group_concat(s.secondary_mover_id) From secondary_movers s Where s.exercise_id = e.exercise_id Group By s.exercise_id ), \'0\' ) as \'secondary_movers_ids\', ifnull ( ( Select group_concat ( ( Case When e.exercise_type = 1 then m.muscle_name When e.exercise_type = 2 or e.exercise_type = 3 then j.joint_name End ) ) From secondary_movers s left join Muscles m on s.secondary_mover_id=m.muscle_id left join Joints j on s.secondary_mover_id=j.joint_id Where s.exercise_id = e.exercise_id Group By s.exercise_id ), \'0\' ) as \'secondary_movers_names\' From Exercises e left join Muscles m on e.primary_mover_id=m.muscle_id left join Joints j on e.primary_mover_id=j.joint_id;
Select * From Clients c Inner Join Schedules s on c.client_id=s.client_id Where %1$s c.start_date <= date(\'now\') And c.end_date >= date(\'now\') And s.schedule_type = 1 And c.client_id <> %2$d;
Select * From Sessions_Log sl Where sl.program_id in ( Select pe.program_id From Program_Exercises pe Where pe.exercise_id = %1$s );

Select s.client_id, c.client_name, s.dayTime, s.program_id, p.program_name, s.duration, s.notes From Session_Log s Inner Join Clients c On s.client_id=c.client_id Inner Join Programs p On s.client_id=p.client_id Where s.client_id = %1$d And date(s.dayTime) = date(\'%2$s\') And date(p.dayTime) = date(\'%2$s\');

Select dat.exercise_id, dat.exercise_name, dat.exercise_type, dat.primary_mover_id, dat.primary_mover_name, dat.secondary_movers_ids, dat.secondary_movers_names, pe.sets, pe.reps, pe.resistance, pe.exercise_order From Program_Exercises pe Inner Join ( Select e.exercise_id, e.exercise_name, e.exercise_type, e.primary_mover_id, ( Case When e.exercise_type = 1 then m.muscle_name When e.exercise_type = 2 or e.exercise_type = 3 then j.joint_name End ) as \'primary_mover_name\', ifnull ( ( Select group_concat(s.secondary_mover_id) From secondary_movers s Where s.exercise_id = e.exercise_id Group By s.exercise_id ), \'0\' ) as \'secondary_movers_ids\', ifnull ( ( Select group_concat( ( Case When e.exercise_type = 1 then m.muscle_name When e.exercise_type = 2 or e.exercise_type = 3 then j.joint_name End ) ) From secondary_movers s left join Muscles m on s.secondary_mover_id=m.muscle_id left join Joints j on s.secondary_mover_id=j.joint_id Where s.exercise_id = e.exercise_id Group By s.exercise_id ), \'0\' ) as \'secondary_movers_names\' From Exercises e left join Muscles m on e.primary_mover_id=m.muscle_id left join Joints j on e.primary_mover_id=j.joint_id ) dat on dat.exercise_id=pe.exercise_id Where pe.program_id = %1$d;
Delete From Session_Changes Where ROWID in ( select ROWID from Session_Changes where client_id = %1$d and change_dayTime = \'0\' limit 1 );

Select s.client_id, c.client_name, s.dayTime, s.program_id, p.program_name, s.duration, s.notes From Session_Log s Inner Join Clients c On s.client_id=c.client_id Inner Join Programs p On s.client_id=p.client_id Where s.client_id = %1$d;

Select pe.program_id dat.exercise_id, dat.exercise_name, dat.exercise_type, dat.primary_mover_id, dat.primary_mover_name, dat.secondary_movers_ids, dat.secondary_movers_names, pe.sets, pe.reps, pe.resistance, pe.exercise_order From Program_Exercises pe Inner Join ( Select e.exercise_id, e.exercise_name, e.exercise_type, e.primary_mover_id, ( Case When e.exercise_type = 1 then m.muscle_name When e.exercise_type = 2 or e.exercise_type = 3 then j.joint_name End ) as \'primary_mover_name\', ifnull ( ( Select group_concat(s.secondary_mover_id) From secondary_movers s Where s.exercise_id = e.exercise_id Group By s.exercise_id ), \'0\' ) as \'secondary_movers_ids\', ifnull ( ( Select group_concat( ( Case When e.exercise_type = 1 then m.muscle_name When e.exercise_type = 2 or e.exercise_type = 3 then j.joint_name End ) ) From secondary_movers s left join Muscles m on s.secondary_mover_id=m.muscle_id left join Joints j on s.secondary_mover_id=j.joint_id Where s.exercise_id = e.exercise_id Group By s.exercise_id ), \'0\' ) as \'secondary_movers_names\' From Exercises e left join Muscles m on e.primary_mover_id=m.muscle_id left join Joints j on e.primary_mover_id=j.joint_id ) dat on dat.exercise_id=pe.exercise_id Where pe.program_id in (%1$s);

Select * From Clients c Inner Join Schedules s on c.client_id=s.client_id Where c.client_id Not in (%1$s) And ( s.schedule_type = 0 Or ( s.schedule_type = 1 And ( Select count(sc.client_id) From Session_Changes sc Where sc.client_id = c.client_id And sc.change_dayTime = \'0\' ) > 0 ) Or ( s.schedule_type = 2 And ( Select count(sl.client_id) From Session_log sl Where sl.client_id = c.client_id And date(sl.dayTime) >= date(\'%2$s\') And date(sl.dayTime) <= date(\'%3$s\') ) < s.days ) Or ( s.schedule_type = 3 And ( Select count(sl.client_id) From Session_log sl Where sl.client_id = c.client_id And date(sl.dayTime) >= date(\'%4$s\') And date(sl.dayTime) <= date(\'%5$s\') ) < s.days ) )
Select s.client_id, c.client_name, s.dayTime, s.program_id, s.duration, s.notes From Session_Log s Inner Join Clients c On s.client_id=c.client_id Where date(dayTime) = date(\'%1$s\');

Select c.client_id, c.client_name, s.%2$s, s.%2$s_duration From Clients c Inner Join Schedules s on c.client_id=s.client_id Where %2$d > 0 And date(end_date) >= date(%1$s) And date(start_date) <= date(%1$s) And schedule_type = 1 And Not ( c.client_id in ( Select Distinct client_id From Session_Changes Where date(normal_dayTime) = date(%1$s) ) Or c.client_id in ( Select s.client_id From Session_log s Where date(dayTime) = date(%1$s) ) );

Select sc.client_id, c.client_name, sc.change_dayTime, sc.duration From Session_Changes sc Inner Join Clients c on sc.client_id=c.client_id Where date(sc.change_dayTime) = date(\'%1$s\') And Not sc.client_id in ( Select s.client_id From Session_log s Where date(dayTime) = date(\'%1$s\') );
Select client_id From Session_Changes Where client_id = %1$d And datetime(change_dayTime) = datetime(\'%2$s\');
Insert Into Session_Changes(client_id, normal_dayTime, change_dayTime, duration ) Values(%1$d, \'%2$s\', \'%3$s\', %4$d);
Update Session_Changes Set change_dayTime = \'%1$s\', duration = %2$d Where client_id = %3$d And datetime(change_dayTime) = datetime(\'${StaticFunctions.getStrDateTime(oldSession.date)}\');

Select sets, reps, resistance, exercise_order From Program_Exercises pe Inner Join Session_log s On pe.program_id=s.program_id Where client_id = %1$d And exercise_id = %2$d Order By dayTime Desc Limit 1;
Select sets, reps, resistance, exercise_order From Program_Exercises pe Inner Join Session_log s On pe.program_id=s.program_id Where client_id = %1$d And exercise_id = %2$d Order By dayTime Desc;
Select joint_id, joint_name From Joints Where joint_id = %1$d;
Select muscle_id, muscle_name From Muscles Where muscle_id = %1$d
Select muscle_id, muscle_name From Muscles Order By muscle_name
Select DISTINCT e.exercise_id From Exercises e Inner Join secondary_movers s on s.exercise_id=e.exercise_id Where e.exercise_type = 1 And (e.primary_mover_id = %1$d or s.secondary_mover_id = %1$d);
Select muscle_name From Muscles Where muscle_name = \'%1$s\' And muscle_id <> %2$d
Update Muscles Set muscle_name = \'%1$s\' Where muscle_id = %2$d
Select * From Clients c Inner Join Schedules s on c.client_id=s.client_id Where c.client_id = %1$d
Select * From Clients c Inner Join Schedules s on c.client_id=s.client_id
Select schedule_type From Schedules Where client_id = %1$d
Select client_id From Session_log s Where s.client_id = %1$d And date(dayTime) = date(\'%2$s\')
Select exercise_name From Exercises Where exercise_name = \'%1$s\' And exercise_id <> %2$d
Select duration From Session_Changes Where client_id = %1$d And datetime(change_dayTime) = datetime(\'%2$s\')
